conversations.body_text: Hi Jonathan Hughes,    We apologize for the delayed response—we've just returned from our 8-day holiday. We've intercepted your shipment and can modify your order. Please let us know the pedal specifications you require and the checkout price; you'll only need to cover the price difference.

Thanks,

The total price is £191.02 for 'Simsonn Plus X Racing Simulation Pedal 
with Haptic Reactor Optional Plus X P3-H3 / Black / without Baseplate'. 
See screen capture below for details

This is with express delivery - I would really appreciate if this can be 
dispatched as quickly as possible as it is required for a project 
starting next week.

Much appreciated,

Jonathan Hughes
Hi Jonathan Hughes,    Please pay via this link, and we will ship it to you via express delivery as soon as possible.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-1

Hi,

That's paid now.

Cheers

Jonathan

Hi

I've had order confirmation email through, but it still shows the item 
as the P2-H2, not the 3 pedal - I'm assuming that's just because you're 
using the original order and that you will ship the 3 pedal?

Cheers

Jonathan
Hi Jonathan Hughes,    Please don't worry—we did indeed ship the 3-pedal set. The order page simply won't be updated.
